column2: This file can be used with the following parts with some limitations:
| Part              | ADC | Comp | PCA | PWM | MDU16 | UART | Timers | GPIO Ports |
| STC8G1K08   8-pin | no  | no   | no  | no  | yes   | 1    | 2      | 2 (3/5)    |
| STC8G1K08A        | yes | no   | yes | no  | yes   | 1    | 2      | 2 (3/5)    |
| STC8G1K08 > 8-pin | yes | yes  | yes | no  | no    | 2    | 3      | 3 (1/3/5)  |

column5: CLK_Output and external interrupt enable register
Power-down wake-up timer control register low
Power-down wake-up timer control register high
Internal high-speed RC oscillator control register
PWM0 PWM0 trigger ADC counter high
PWM0 PWM0 trigger ADC counter low
PWM1 PWM1 trigger ADC counter high
PWM1 PWM1 trigger ADC counter low
PWM2 PWM2 trigger ADC counter high
PWM2 PWM2 trigger ADC counter low
PWM3 PWM3 trigger ADC counter high
PWM3 PWM3 trigger ADC counter low
PWM4 PWM4 trigger ADC counter high
PWM4 PWM4 trigger ADC counter low
PWM5 PWM5 trigger ADC counter high
PWM5 PWM5 trigger ADC counter low
PWM group 5 interrupt (usage in C => see STC8G TRM appendix N)
PWM group 2 fault detection interrupt (usage in C => see STC8G TRM appendix N)
PWM group 4 fault detection interrupt (usage in C => see STC8G TRM appendix N)
Touch key interrupt (usage in C => see STC8G TRM appendix N)
